group.label: AvaTax Configuration
group.comment: For complete and up-to-date documentation, please visit Connector for Magento 2 for Sales Tax.

field.comment: This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled, as shipping Tax Code is hard-coded as FR020100 and AvaTax will determine whether tax applies to an order.

This setting applies only to gift wrapping options, not Gift Cards; if AvaTax is enabled, the Gift Card Tax Code is hard-coded as PG050000 and AvaTax will determine whether tax applies to an order for a Gift Card.
This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled, as AvaTax always calculates tax on a row level.
This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled, as AvaTax always uses the shipping address for estimation.
This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled, as you must set your prices in Magento without taxes included so that AvaTax is the single system of record for tax estimation.
This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled, as AvaTax must be responsible for calculating shipping tax.
This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled, as AvaTax doesn't support line-level discounts.
This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled, as AvaTax doesn't support line-level discounts.
This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled, as AvaTax should always calculate tax after discounts are applied in Magento.
This setting will be ignored if AvaTax is enabled.

If AvaTax is enabled, it is highly recommended that you leave this field blank. Otherwise, the number of AvaTax API requests will increase significantly, as every time a guest adds a product to their cart, AvaTax will calculate tax for the postal code entered above.
The AvaTax extension does not support the usage of Fixed Product Taxes, so do not enable this option.
